name: ext_R4_ResearchSubject
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ResearchSubject for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchSubject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Physical entity which is the primary unit of interest in the study
element.definition: A physical entity which is the primary unit of operational and/or administrative interest in a study.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element.
